::Eclipse/Wolveritron::

    They returned to the base. Eclipse knew he had=
 a mission, but didn't know what it was. But he did know all of his forms. =
He had a Homid mode, which was Robot without weapons, he had a communicatio=
ns and long range optics in this mode. Then there was Galbro mode, the armo=
red Robot mode, he had weapons up the wazoo. Then, Crinos mode, his werewol=
f form, with melee weapons only. Next, Hispo mode, the armored wolf mode. H=
e was a large wolf, but with guns out his shoulders and on his back. Last, =
Lupus mode, his wolf form, he had excellent hearing and smell in this mode,=
 but sacrificed sight for it. He couldn't see that well, certainly not far =
out. In all modes there was something sliver on him, not the color, but the=
 element. In Crinos, Hispo, and Lupus his fur was made of the element.
    =
Wolveritron had discovered his vehicle mode, a drill machine. His claws bec=
ame drills for underground travel. They walked to the CF together, Eclipse =
in Crinos mode and Wolveritron in Robot Mode.
    Eclipse saw Aerotaur and =
Trinity, along with another bot. (I think) Eclipse spoke to them. "Hey, dud=
es, who are you?"
